'''''Minecraft: The Island''''' is a series of novels by American author [[Max Brooks]]. It currently consists of three novels that take place sequentially:

* ''[[Minecraft: The Island]]'', the first novel in the series, published by {{W|Del Rey Books}} on July 18, 2017.
* ''[[Minecraft: The Mountain]]'', the second novel in the series, published by Del Rey Books on March 2, 2021.
* ''[[Minecraft: The Village]]'', the third novel in the series, published by Random House Worlds on October 17, 2023.
